templates.title: Name of project: type of company (must fit on one line)
templates.description: Name of project: type of company (must fit on one line). Contains: bullet points, text content.

company_description.description: The first paragraph describes the company in up to three sentences. The second paragraph describes the business need in up to three sentences.

our_role.description: Up to five bullets to explain what we did. These must cover our role on the project, not background information. In the present tense.

results.description: Up to five bullets to explain what we did. These must be results of the particular project i.e. our work. Should be tangible; quantify where possible (%, not numbers).

quote.description: quote surrounded by double quotation marks, followed by client name and job title

templates.title: Client references
templates.description: Client references. Contains: bullet points.

reference_1.description: Bullet points to cover our role on the project and what we did, not background information, in the present tense. Include tangible results of our work on the project; quantify where possible (%, not numbers)

<lang2>
